channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR

item.title: Report E-2024050121
item.description:
Report E-2024050121

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-23T15:12:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-07
  • City: Portland
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: PORTLAND & WESTERN RAILROAD
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Upon inspection by ODOT it was noted that the vent valve on top of car was not closed all the way and the secondary plug was not tightened either. Car department came out and closed valve and tightened plug all the way.
